name: SHOOTING PIRATES
description:
Shooting pirates is a survival game where enemies come out from left to right and you have to shoot them. The health decreases when you shoot the enemies but your health decreases when the pirates attack you with their sword. The display on the enemy you killed is there on the top left underneath the health bar. When you are killed, you get to respawn and start again! 

Controls: W or Up Arrow (Move Up), A or Left Arrow (Move Left), S or Down Arrow (Move Down), D or Right Arrow (Move Right), F (To shoot).
